biotools.summary: Automated image analysis tool for quantification of angiogenesis. It is designed for in vitro angiogenesis assays that are based on co-culturing endothelial cells with fibroblasts. It provides quantitative and repeatable measurements of the lengths and sizes of tubule complexes as well as the numbers of junctions (branching points) in the tubule complexes.

bioschemas.name: AngioQuant
bioschemas.summary: Automated image analysis tool for quantification of angiogenesis. It is designed for in vitro angiogenesis assays that are based on co-culturing endothelial cells with fibroblasts. It provides quantitative and repeatable measurements of the lengths and sizes of tubule complexes as well as the numbers of junctions (branching points) in the tubule complexes.
